api_list.name: Get Video Title and Thumbnail via Video ID
api_list.description: You can get video title and thumbnail with video id.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://youtube-search-fast.p.rapidapi.com/api/youtube/ViaBzK11EkE"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "youtube-search-fast.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://youtube-search-fast.p.rapidapi.com/api/youtube/{video_id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "youtube-search-fast.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Search Results via Query
api_list.description: You can get search results with query.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://youtube-search-fast.p.rapidapi.com/api/youtube/search/rapid-api"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "youtube-search-fast.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://youtube-search-fast.p.rapidapi.com/api/youtube/search/{query}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "youtube-search-fast.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
